articles.title: Mother, 37, died in a Utah jail after crying in pain for four days and was refused help
articles.description: Lisa Marie Ostler, 37, was suffering from an infection related to gastric bypass surgery but denied help from guards at the Salt Lake County Jail. She died on April 3, 2016.

articles.title: Utah shooting suspect arrested in Nevada
articles.description: RENO, Nev. (AP) — A 31-year-old man once considered Public Enemy No. 1 by the Salt Lake City Gang Unit has been arrested in Nevada as a suspect in a shooting in northern Utah.

articles.title: The Problem with Suburban Police
articles.description: The East Pittsburgh police department that is responsible for killing the unarmed teenager Antwon Rose, Jr. is one of more than a hundred police departments across metro Pittsburgh—and that’s a problem.

articles.author: Katie England Daily Herald
articles.title: Republican primary will decide Utah County's next sheriff
articles.description: Utah County voters don’t have to wait until November to find out who their new sheriff will be: the June 26 primary decides that, since only Republicans filed for the seat.
